Agriculture is a vital spot for economic development for many countries. Since plant diseases, weeds and pests are the most considerable concerns for adequate crop production worldwide, the pest control is a crucial step for eliminating the yield losses
1 . Pesticides are biocidal substances which have been indispensably utilized in crop production for an effective fight against pests such as insects, fungi, herbs and mites
2 . Despite their large scale uses and economic benefits in agricultural areas, overexposure to various pesticides carries high risks for the environment and biota.
